urls.title: Environment Agency chief supports plan to weaken river pollution rules
urls.description: Campaigners say Sir James Bevan is trying to ‘rig system’ and cover up decades of failure

text: @DefraGovUK @DewlayCheese Taking advantage of #brexit, the @EnvAgency (answers to @DefraGovUK)  is working to undermine river water standards, aiming to reclassify ~75% of rivers that currently fail EU minimum standards as exceeding requirements. #SurfersAgainstSewage - https://t.co/rTafZv46B8
